translations: [计量] 厘米；[计量] 公分

phrs.translation: n. 平方厘米，平方公分

sentences.sentence: A seed only needs one cubic centimeter of soil to grow.
sentences.translation: 一颗种子只需要一立方厘米的土壤就能生长。

sentences.sentence: All the samples were taken from a centimeter-long, extremely thin ribbon of the metallic glass.
sentences.translation: 所有的样品都取自一厘米长的极薄的金属玻璃带。
